reviews.title: Crashes
reviews.comment: App crashes ever since sprint updated my android o/s to ice cream sandwich. Make the app work on newer software!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great show awesome facts
reviews.comment: App doesn\'t work all the time. Heard one past podcast. Now everytime I try n listen it tells me \"nothing found\".. these guys know their tomatoes inside n out!
